cybersecurity.title: SERI: Cyber Risk Assessment Framework for Financial Systems
bullets: Designed a structured framework to identify, categorize, and prioritize cyber risks in financial systems.
Analyzed assets, threat vectors, and existing controls to reason about real-world risk exposure.
Enabled clearer security decision-making aligned with compliance and business goals.

cybersecurity.title: TrapTrack: Automated Detection of Privacy Leaks in Cookie Consent Workflows
bullets: Investigated privacy leaks triggered by cookie consent mechanisms on live websites.
Built a browser-based system to trace network traffic before and after consent actions.
Revealed hidden third-party data flows and unintended data disclosures.

cybersecurity.title: AegisAI: LLM-Assisted Cybersecurity Detection and Threat Analysis Platform
bullets: Built a unified platform for phishing, malware, and URL threat detection.
Combined rule-based detection with LLM-driven reasoning for deeper analysis.
Improved explainability through clear, user-facing threat summaries.

cybersecurity.title: Enterprise Threat Assessment & Risk Modeling (McAfee)
bullets: Conducted enterprise-wide threat assessment to identify critical assets.
Evaluated risks using confidentiality, integrity, and availability principles.
Proposed mitigation strategies based on risk severity and business impact.

systems.title: Bankruptcy Risk Prediction Using Data Mining and Feature Analysis
bullets: Built predictive models to analyze bankruptcy risk from financial datasets.
Performed feature analysis to identify influential financial indicators.
Compared multiple modeling approaches to study performance behavior.

systems.title: Exploratory Data Analysis and AI-Driven Insights on Suicide Trends
bullets: Analyzed large-scale datasets across time, age, and geography.
Applied visualization and AI techniques to uncover hidden patterns.
Translated results into interpretable, human-centered insights.

systems.title: CPU Scheduling Algorithms: Simulation and Performance Analysis
bullets: Implemented FCFS, SJF, and Round Robin scheduling algorithms in Java.
Evaluated turnaround time, waiting time, and CPU utilization.
Analyzed trade-offs between fairness and performance.

applications.title: Full-Stack Web Application for Interactive Arrest Data Analysis
bullets: Developed a full-stack application for interactive data exploration.
Designed backend APIs for efficient querying and filtering.
Focused on usability and clean user experience.

applications.title: AI-Powered Heritage Search Engine with Semantic Retrieval
bullets: Built a semantic search system beyond keyword matching.
Integrated a chatbot interface for contextual query answering.
Designed the full retrieval and interaction pipeline.

applications.title: Web-Based Room and Resource Allocation System
bullets: Built a portal to manage room and hall bookings across departments.
Implemented database-backed availability and reservation tracking.
Reduced manual coordination through streamlined workflows.
